meanings.definition: A hairstyle where the hair is combed upward and back from the forehead.
meanings.sent1: She styled her hair in a quiff for the party.
meanings.sent2: His quiff looked stylish and neat.
meanings.sent3: The quiff on her head made her look taller.
meanings.sent4: His quiff was like a wave frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The quiff added a touch of elegance to her overall look.

meanings.definition: To style one's hair in a quiff.
meanings.sent1: He decided to quiff his hair before the event.
meanings.sent2: She always quiffs her hair for special occasions.
meanings.sent3: Quiffing his hair seemed like a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: She quiffed her hair with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: Quiffing her hair transformed her entire appearance.

meanings.definition: A puff or tuft of hair.
meanings.sent1: The little girl had a cute quiff on top of her head.
meanings.sent2: His quiff of hair stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The quiff of hair on the puppy made it look adorable.
meanings.sent4: The quiff of hair resembled a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent5: The quiff of hair added a playful touch to his look.
